item.title: regression
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 一个线性回归的神经网络模型 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 import torch import numpy as np import pandas as pd import plotly.graph_objects as go import torch.nn import torch.nn.functional as F from torch.autograd import Variable 1 2 3 4 5 x = torch.unsqueeze(torch.linspace(-10,10,100),dim=1) y = x*2+10+torch.rand(x.size()) # scatter = go.Scatter(x = torch.squeeze(x),y = torch.squeeze(y),mode = 'markers') # fig = go.Figure(scatter) #
